tool_description: Generates injector element patterns and configurations for optimal propellant mixing, combustion efficiency, and thermal management in liquid rocket engines.

injector_type.description: Type of injector: impinging, pintle, shear_coax, swirl, shower_head

mass_flow_rate.description: Total propellant mass flow rate in kg/s (0.01 to 1000.0)

mixture_ratio.description: Oxidizer to fuel mass ratio (0.1 to 20.0)

injection_pressure_drop.description: Pressure drop across injector as percentage of chamber pressure (5.0 to 50.0)

error_messages: Invalid injector type: Must be one of [impinging, pintle, shear_coax, swirl, shower_head]
Mass flow rate out of range: Value must be between 0.01 and 1000.0 kg/s
Mixture ratio out of range: Value must be between 0.1 and 20.0
Injection pressure drop out of range: Value must be between 5.0 and 50.0 percent
Number of elements out of range: Value must be between 1 and 500
Element sizing error: Mass flow rate too low for specified number of elements
usage: Specify injector_type, mass_flow_rate from chamber design, and mixture_ratio. Optionally set injection_pressure_drop and number_of_elements. Tool generates injector geometry and flow characteristics for manufacturing.

element_spacing.description: Center-to-center spacing between elements in meters
